title: TypeTogether releases additional weights for Skolar
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103130127/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 22.Jun.2009 10.10am 

The successful typeface [Skolar](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103130127/http:/www.type-together.com/Skolar), by David Březina, has been expanded by 2 more essential weights, Bold Italic and Semibold Italic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103130127im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SkolarII_4378.gif)

We offer an upgrade from the previous bundle for only €30. Please contact TypeTogether for details.
author: Miss Tiffany
